channel.title: Sinsec | Perfection is the only option!
channel.description:
Sinsec | 24/7 | 718/728
What has changed? We have updated from 718 to 728, therefore this has brought many new features! Every day we push through new updates that the players suggest!
Why would you want to join? We listen to the community. The community is the most important part of any game or server and on Sinsec you will find yourself in one of the best RSPS communities. We also have excellent staff, and we work every day to improve our server. Sinsec is an economy focused server. We are constantly adding content to the server that the players want! There are many features in-game, and you can see a list below and link with all the links needed to play.
728 links Webclient: http://sinsec.net/webclient.php Forums: http://sinsec.net/ Client: http://sinsec.net/sinsec.jar
Pics: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A0CaLVZ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dazguMX.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wI4PhNS.png[/img]
What we offer: [*]All 3 types of dwarf multicannons.[*]Unique Content[*]Custom Minigames[*]Queen Black Dragon[*]Warrior's Guild[*]Custom Quests![*]Recipe for Disaster[*]Fairy Rings[*]Custom commands[*]Active, growing community![*]Dedicated development team[*]Active Staff[*]Constant updates[*]Loyalty System[*]Prestiging Tiers[*]Magic Whistle system[*]Vote4Cash & Vote4Items[*]Quick and safe donation system[*]EXP boosting accesories for Loyal players[*]Unique Loyalty points shop for dedicated players[*]Fully working web-based highscores and signature cards
- Dedi Hosted 24/7 - 300MB/s Uplink - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Old and new Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Loyalty point system with shop (300 points every 30mins) - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Frost Dragons - Tormented Demons - New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Money pouch - Working clan wars! - Great staff and community - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home
Sinsec 317
-- Unique features, short and to the point: - Known because of our 'perfect' summoning. - Perfect clanchat, lootshare integration. - Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. 'perfect' - Revenants in the wilderness with the working effect for the forinthry brace. - Unique minigames such as the Blast Furnace minigame. - Corporeal beast with working zamorakian spear. - Awesome killstreak system, the higher your killstreak is the more pk points you get. - Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, 'perfect' - Realistic skills, e.g. trees becoming stumps, rocks running out of resources. - Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, 'perfect' - Awesome lottery, saves all names and lottery size on restart. - Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs - Impossible to cheat with packets(checking everything server-sided) - Last but not least, NO BUGS
Play Now: http://www.sinsec.net/317/webclient.php Website: http://www.sinsec.net Forums: http://sinsec.net DownLoad: http://sinsec.net/317/sinsec.jar -- [video=youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=mpf6bATvhzA[/video] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7p4ydcw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fYP2pfd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JmnmSUW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BoSldHC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/scLvZZs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Cfesq92.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TGjr7qY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/arq3ex0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3waM6i0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Z18T4Qc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iGKagjV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AakJ4PS.png[/img]

item.title: Sinsec | Perfection is the only option!
item.dc:creator: @aRspsOwn aRspsOwn
item.description:
@aRspsOwn wrote:

Sinsec | 24/7 | 718/728

What has changed?
We have updated from 718 to 728, therefore this has brought many new features!
Every day we push through new updates that the players suggest!

Why would you want to join?
We listen to the community. The community is the most important part of any game or server and on Sinsec you will find yourself in one of the best RSPS communities. We also have excellent staff, and we work every day to improve our server. Sinsec is an economy focused server.
We are constantly adding content to the server that the players want!
There are many features in-game, and you can see a list below and link with all the links needed to play.

728 links
Webclient: http://sinsec.net/webclient.php
Forums: http://sinsec.net/
Client: http://sinsec.net/sinsec.jar

Pics:

A0CaLVZ.jpg1026×606

dazguMX.jpg970×569

wI4PhNS.png1029×604

What we offer: []All 3 types of dwarf multicannons.[]Unique Content[]Custom Minigames[]Queen Black Dragon[]Warrior’s Guild[]Custom Quests![]Recipe for Disaster[]Fairy Rings[]Custom commands[]Active, growing community![]Dedicated development team[]Active Staff[]Constant updates[]Loyalty System[]Prestiging Tiers[]Magic Whistle system[]Vote4Cash & Vote4Items[]Quick and safe donation system[]EXP boosting accesories for Loyal players[]Unique Loyalty points shop for dedicated players[*]Fully working web-based highscores and signature cards

  • Dedi Hosted 24/7 - 300MB/s Uplink
  • No lag
  • Stable Economy
  • 100% Uptime
  • Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic
  • 138 combat, summoning counts
  • Constant Updates
  • Professional and active Staff
  • Active Clean Forums
  • Old and new Runescape Armor
  • DonatorZone (with shops)
  • Loyalty point system with shop (300 points every 30mins)
  • Various shops.
  • Dominion Tower
  • Lava Flow Mining
  • Frost Dragons
  • Tormented Demons
  • New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin)
  • Squeal of fortune.
  • Bone’s on altar.
  • Hunter.
  • All the GodWars Dungeons.
  • Fully working Nex.
  • Curses, ancients etc.
  • Working Revenants.
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Fight Kiln
  • Fight Caves
  • Custom Dung!
  • Working chaotics
  • Working Flowers and Dicing
  • Money pouch
  • Working clan wars!
  • Great staff and community
  • fully working slayer and slayer tower!
  • Auto-Voting
  • Auto-Donate
  • Great PvP and switching
  • Owner takes all ideas into consideration.
  • Perfect switching
  • unique home

Sinsec 317

–
Unique features, short and to the point:

  • Known because of our ‘perfect’ summoning.
  • Perfect clanchat, lootshare integration.
  • Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. ‘perfect’
  • Revenants in the wilderness with the working effect for the forinthry brace.
  • Unique minigames such as the Blast Furnace minigame.
  • Corporeal beast with working zamorakian spear.
  • Awesome killstreak system, the higher your killstreak is the more pk points you get.
  • Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, ‘perfect’
  • Realistic skills, e.g. trees becoming stumps, rocks running out of resources.
  • Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, ‘perfect’
  • Awesome lottery, saves all names and lottery size on restart.
  • Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs
  • Impossible to cheat with packets(checking everything server-sided)
  • Last but not least, NO BUGS

Play Now: http://www.sinsec.net/317/webclient.php
Website: http://www.sinsec.net
Forums: http://sinsec.net
DownLoad: http://sinsec.net/317/sinsec.jar
